item.title: Spinal Tap Releases ‘Stonehenge’ With Elton John, Unveils New Album Tied to Mockumentary Sequel
item.description: The re-recording of classic cut “Stonehenge” will appear on ‘The End Continues,’ the forthcoming album for the mockumentary ‘Spinal Tap II: The End Continues,’ out on Sept. 12.

item.title: Rob Reiner Teases Paul McCartney, Elton John Cameos in ‘Spinal Tap II’
item.description: The sequel to the 1984 cult classic ‘This Is Spinal Tap’ hits theaters in September.
